data.text: @MarkieLeeHayes @viviankirkfield This is magical! I love how communities came together. I hope your boy felt loved.
@MarkieLeeHayes @viviankirkfield Great story and the graphic matches perfectly!
@MarkieLeeHayes @viviankirkfield I’ve been known to make custom Christmas ornaments… https://t.co/lE6ftH9O7m
@audreyperrott @viviankirkfield I love that so much!!! I’ve been trying to find affordable red shoe ornaments to start passing out at Christmas 😆
@DJChristie6 @viviankirkfield I know! It’s amazing what a group of moms will do for one another!! ❤️
@denadavisbooks @viviankirkfield Thank you, Dena! I always love reading about your son’s journey, as well ❤️

@MarkieLeeHayes @viviankirkfield What a beautiful moment for your boy! I love when community shows caring! We need more stories highlighting the good in people! Now when I see red shoes I will think of Lincoln! 👠
@MarkieLeeHayes @viviankirkfield I almost bought a pair of red shoes yesterday because I was so inspired by your son and this story, Markie!
